text.jpText:
トレーナーさん、手を上げてみてくださいっ！
両手をめいっぱい！
満開の桜みたいに、パッと！
text.enText:
Trainer, please try raising both hands! 
As high as you can! 
Like a cherry blossom in full bloom!

text.jpText:
…………はい。もう大丈夫です。
ゆっくり下ろしてくださいね。
text.enText:
…………Ok, that's good enough. 
You can put them down slowly.

text.jpText:
どうです？　お父さん直伝のストレッチ！
自然と体が開いて、スッキリしません？
text.enText:
How was it? It's a stretch that was taught to 
me by my father! Don't you feel refreshed 
after stretching out?

text.jpText:
ずんずんって道を進むことも大事ですけど
……時には、太陽を見てひと息。
そういう時間も大切にしていきましょう♪
text.enText:
I know it's important to get things done, but... 
We should also treasure the times that we're 
able to bask in sunlight and just breath♪
